subject: Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Deaths (Fatalities)
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: As Nascar enters the Daytona 500 after another year of dipping ratings, some point to the loss of Dale Earnhardt Sr. 10 years ago as the reason for the decline in interest.
snippet: As Nascar enters the Daytona 500 after another year of dipping ratings, some point to the loss of Dale Earnhardt Sr. 10 years ago as the reason for the decline in interest.
